name: Mehmet Tan
content: Mehmet Tan Mehmet Tan Associate Professor Department of Computer Engineering TOBB University of Economics and Technology Main Research Teaching Contact I am a faculty member in Dept. of Computer Engineering at TOBB-ETU. Before that, I worked and completed my PhD in Dept. of Computer Engineering at METU, and was a visiting scholar in Dept. of Computer Science at UofC. I am the director of CBML.
